description: It's a straight forward presentation app, works well and it's easy to use. Will surely use it for my next presentation!
This app does what it should do! And this is awesome!

Hope the developer keeps up the good work. This is really nice!
More shapes would be nice, and currently the Flatpak cannot access my pictures as it only requests access to "Home" but my "Pictures" folder is on a different drive. But other than that, this is a perfect example of how simplicity can be used to your advantage when done well!
